statements: DELETE FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE account_id = 123 AND reason = 'Fraudulent activity';
DELETE FROM blacklist_accounts WHERE date_added < '2022-01-01' AND account_holder LIKE '%Smith%';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE transaction_date <= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM fraud_accounts WHERE account_id = 100 AND blacklist_reason = 'Fraudulent Activity';
DELETE FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_accounts WHERE account_id = 100 AND blacklisted = true;
DELETE FROM flagged_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000.00;
